24 Jan 2014

Tinypress update

I made some changes to tinypress. It now features post listing (last 5 posts. ‘More’ coming soon), post editing and deleting.

Check it out at tinypress.co.

My name is Opeyemi Obembe. I build things for web and mobile. You should follow me on Twitter (@kehers).
